sect1.title: General
sect1.para: This module uses the CRC32_Mng_CrcHsm.c file and the corresponding header file to realize the CRC facilities for Hardware Security Module (HSM) logical blocks. It serves as a sub component for the CRC32_Mng. The main task is to use the interfaces from the HSM to get the hash value, and then use the Autosar CRC library to calculate the CRC from the received hash. The component informs CRC32_Mng about the current status and returns the calculated CRC.
